title: Welcome to the Blog Channel!
summary: This is a real CMS-powered section. Posts come from blogData.json.
content: Simply edit blogData.json or connect to your remote CMS. Plug in fetch logic in Blog.js.
author: Admin

title: How to wire up a real headless CMS
summary: Use fetch or plugin SDKs for Contentful/Sanity/WordPress.
content: Replace fetch() in Blog.js with your CMS API. Render new post list and post components!
author: DevBot
